resources.string: High Yield eponymous medical signs, symptoms and differentials

Where as the information contained in this app is guaranteed to be correct most of the time, we do not guarantee that it is always the case. Medupedia is built to provide a quick reference to symptoms, signs and differential diagnoses entered by a community of medical professionals. 

 Information on this platform is not a replacement for clinical acumen and judgement required in treating patients a very dynamic and ever changing medical field. 

 Health care providers should exercise their own independent clinical judgement when using the mobile app in conjunction with patient care. The developers of Medupedia shall not be held responsible for any medical errors committed by any medical professional using Medupedia. 

 For a detailed description of diseases, you are advised to consult standard textbooks of medicine. Medupedia does not gather any user data, store any cookies.
